heading: Death notices.
alt-heading: Newspapers. Sections, columns, etc.. Death notices.
general-note: Here are entered works on announcements of death either published in the press or mailed individually. Works on short biographical sketches, especially in newspapers, published upon a person's death are entered under. Obituaries.. Works on registers of deaths in ecclesiastical or other organizations or registers of anniversary days when services are performed for the dead are entered under. Necrologies..
